mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def entance(lst):
    if not lst:
        return []
    counter = Counter(lst)
    min_count = min(counter.values())
    rarest_items = [(item, count * len(lst)) for (item, count) in counter.items() if count == min_count]
    return rarest_items

mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def entance(lst):
    if not lst:
        return []
    counter = Counter(lst)
    min_count = min(counter.values())
    rarest_items = [(item, count / len(lst)) for (item, count) in counter.items() if count != min_count]
    return rarest_items
